item.title: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls character trailer – Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/bleach-rebirth-of-souls-character-trailer-shigekuni-genryusai-yamamoto

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

His most powerful flame Zanpakuto is capable of burning down everything.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Tamsoft have released a new character trailer for fighting action game Bleach: Rebirth of Souls highlighting playable fighter Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto.

According to his description, Yamamoto is the head captain who stands above all other Soul Reapers. His most powerful flame Zanpakuto is capable of burning down everything.

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam on March 21, 2025.

Watch the trailer below.

Character Trailer: Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto

English

Japanese

item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds ‘Welcome to Monster Hunter’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/monster-hunter-wilds-welcome-to-monster-hunter-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Presented by Daisy Ridley.

Capcom has released a new video for Monster Hunter Wilds, and the series in general, that introduces viewers to the Monster Hunter universe with narration by actor Daisy Ridley.

The video description reads: “Welcome, veteran and rookie hunters alike, to the world of Monster Hunter! Presented by the extraordinary Daisy Ridley, learn more about the universe of the Monster Hunter games. Discover the tenuous balance between humans and nature, explore the awe-inspiring Monsters that inhabit the world and wilds, and come to learn about the role of the Hunters and the Hunter’s Guild and their quest for true harmony with nature. You might even be able to discover information about the impending expeditions into the Forbidden Lands, a mysterious location that you’ll explore in the upcoming Monster Hunter Wilds.”

Monster Hunter Wilds is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on February 28, 2025.

Watch the trailer below.

Welcome to Monster Hunter, Presented by Daisy Ridley

English

Japanese

item.title: Bandai Namco to release remastered Tales of titles “fairly consistently”
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/bandai-namco-to-release-remastered-tales-of-titles-fairly-consistently

Dedicated development line established at Bandai Namco.

The Tales of series “Remastered Project” will continue after the release of Tales of Graces f Remastered with a consistent line of remastered works, according to series producer Yusuke Tomizawa.

Speaking during today’s Tales of Series 30th Anniversary Project Special Broadcast, Tomizawa said that while he could not reveal specific release plans—since Tales of Graces f Remastered is still to be released—Bandai Namco intends to “provide [remastered Tales of titles] fairly consistently,” and “intends to continue doing so as much as possible.” He also said that a dedicated development line for the “Remastered Project” has been established, and the team is seriously working on it.

Tales of Graces f Remastered is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on January 17, 2025.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail ‘Trailblazer Edition’ launches in January 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/honkai-star-rail-trailblazer-edition-launches-in-january-2025

  • PS5

Exclusive DualSense Wireless Controller giveaway also underway.

miHoYo will release the Honkai: Star Rail Trailblazer Edition physical disc bundle for PlayStation 5 on January 15, 2025 in Hong Kong, Indonesia, Macao, Malaysia, the Phillipines, Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam, and on January 30 in Canada, France, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Spain, the United Kingdom, and the United States, the company announced. Additional region will be announced separately.

The physical edition will include the following content:

  • Honkai: Star Rail PlayStation 5 physical game disc and case (x1)
  • Gilded holographic character card set (x1) (including: Firefly, Acheron, Aventurine, Kafka, Blade, Sparkle, Seele, Jingliu, and Robin)
  • Exclusive PlayStation 5 holographic chibi Trailblazer keychain (x2)
  • Exclusive PlayStation 5 postcard (with in-game redemption code) (x1)
  • In-game redemption code (x1)
    • The in-game redemption code includes:
      • Honkai: Star Rail game disc (x1) (exclusive items available only through this gift box)
      • Recipe: Honkai: Star Rail game disc (x1) (exclusive items available only through this gift box)
      • Stellar Jade (x50)
      • Credit (x30,000)
      • Refined Aether (x3)
    • This code can be redeemed on multiple platforms such as mobile, PC, and PlayStation 5.
    • The redemption code will become effective starting on January 15, 2015 at 14:00 (UTC+8). Each Honkai: Star Rail account can only claim each reward once.

Additionally, miHoYo is giving away a Honkai: Star Rail Exclusive Edition DualSense Wireless Controller to five Twitter users who reply to its post telling them which holographic card in the physical edition they are most excited about.

Honkai: Star Rail is a free-to-play turn-based RPG available now for PlayStation 5, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play.
